job.title: Software Engineer - Data Solutions RWF
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtThis position will support the Customer Excellence enterprise function formed in 2019 which enables a holistic view of critical customer interaction points and partners across lines of business to strengthen the experiences we provide to our customers Specifically this group will identify and implement enhancements defined by the Customer Remediation Center of Excellence business group and constantly look for solutions to improve application performance stability and availability of end to end solution This is a mission critical function that will move the needle on supporting our customers and team members meet the expectations of our regulators and continue to transform the companyltbrgtltbrgtThis role is a Senior role within the Customer Remediation Technology team responsible forltbrgtltbrgtApplication DesignltbrgtltulgtltligtParticipates in application design by providing feedback and guidance on available technology options to business problems specific to sanctions screeningltligtltligtProvides highlevel estimates for different alternative designs to help guide functional designltbrgtltligtltulgtArchitecture  High Level DesignltbrgtltulgtltligtAnalyzes complex business requirements designs and writes architecture and technical specifications to design computer applicationsltligtltligtLeads application detail design providing guidance and consultation to other members of the development teamltligtltligtAnalyzes requirements specific to the technical needs of the highly available high volume realtime transactional processing systemltbrgtltligtltulgtConstructionltbrgtltulgtltligtDevelops highly complex original codeltligtltligtProvides technical assistance to less experienced staffltligtltligtVerifies program logic by Reviewing detailed design prepared by other members of the technical staff and Participating in code walkthroughsltbrgtltligtltulgtDeploymentltbrgtltulgtltligtEnsure any modified or new components are welldocumented so that the deployment team can deploy efficientlyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOther RequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtParticipates in process refinement for the entire software development life cycleltligtltligtAssures quality security and compliance requirements are metltbrgtltligtltulgtRWF  Please note that RWF is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the jobltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligt5 years of Java experienceltligtltligt3 years of relational database experienceltligtltligt3 years of data analysis experienceltligtltligt2  years of experience with Agile toolsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligtA BSBA degree or higher in information technologyltligtltligtGood verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligt1 year of Tableau experienceltligtltligtAbility to be proactive innovative and creative in meeting customer and enterprise needsltligtltligt4 years of ETL data warehouse and data analytics delivery experience on
